headline: SEC Eyes New Exchange That Could Upend the Options Market
summary: Proponents say the new exchange could protect institutional traders from being outraced by deep-pocketed, computerized rivals.

raw.headline: SEC Eyes New Exchange That Could Upend the Options Market
raw.summary: Proponents say the new exchange could protect institutional traders from being outraced by deep-pocketed, computerized rivals.

headline: Charles Schwab to Open 16 New Retail Branches, Hire Wealth Consultants
summary: Charles Schwab is betting on the success of the human touch by expanding its retail client branch network and hiring for 400 branch-related roles.

raw.headline: Charles Schwab to Open 16 New Retail Branches, Hire Wealth Consultants
raw.summary: Charles Schwab is betting on the success of the human touch by expanding its retail client branch network and hiring for 400 branch-related roles.

headline: Charles Schwab Is Building More Bricks-And-Mortar Offices. Here’s Why.
summary: The brokerage firm says it wants to increase the number of in-person offices it has in places where its customer base is growing.

raw.headline: Charles Schwab Is Building More Bricks-And-Mortar Offices. Here’s Why.
raw.summary: The brokerage firm says it wants to increase the number of in-person offices it has in places where its customer base is growing.

headline: Charles Schwab Announces Branch Network Expansion and the Addition of 400 Branch-Related Roles to Meet Increasing Client Needs and Fuel Further Growth
summary: WESTLAKE, Texas, September 17, 2025--Charles Schwab today revealed details of a significant expansion of its branch network, underscoring the firm’s commitment to serve its fast-growing retail client base through a range of channels, including in-person guidance, relationships, and service.
